Inglath Cooper is The Romance Author For Today's Romance Reader Inglath Cooper is The Romance Author For Today's Romance Reader 0 
For many years, the romance genre was somewhat stagnant with older, more established authors spinning the same old stories time and time again and new authors simply trying to emulate what seemed to be working in order to break into the business. However, there is one author who is daring to be different. 
Inglath Cooper is a new, contemporary romance author that is taking the literary industry by storm. Not only has she created some of the most intriguing, engaging new romance stories available, she has also embraced today's high technology world and made her books available for immediate digital download. What's more is that Inglath Cooper is now offering your first digital download of any one of her exciting new romance novels for free. 
That's right. You can begin enjoying Nashville, a whirlwind romance novel and what is sure to become your favorite new novel without charge. Nashville is a series of romance novels that follow the exploits of CeCe as she makes her way through her life. Nashville, Part One Ready to Reach is the first in what is currently a nine part series that chronicles the ups and downs of CeCe's life and demonstrates the caliber of writing Rita Award winning author Inglath Cooper is capable of bringing to the genre. 
And the Nashville series is just one of the many fine examples of exceptional writing offered by Inglath Cooper. She has also penned several other incredible best selling romance novels including Dragonfly Summer, Rock Her, Blue Wide Sky, Jane Austen Girl and many more. And, of course, Inglath Cooper has many more stories to come. 
Inglath Cooper is a true contemporary romance novelist. Her online romance novels are fresh and invigorating. Inglath has proven that she has the ability to create exciting new romance stories that don't simply emulate older, so called "tried and true" formulaic stories. She has the ability to create romance stories that are relatable to today's generation of readers. She is a true romance writer. Her characters are three dimensional and identifiable, lending a realism to her stories that can't be found in most other contemporary novels. And, her gift for storytelling is mesmerizing. Readers often find themselves caught up in the moment, leaving them as breathless as the characters they are seeing the stories through. 
So, if you are ready to take on your next romance novel journey, don't settle for more of the same. Visit inglathcooper.com/ and start that journey with Inglath Cooper with your free copy of Nashville Part One: Ready to Reach. Download it today to your computer or mobile device and get ready to be immersed in the romance that you've been missing for years. There is no better romance novelist in the industry. Visit today and discover your new favorite romance writer. If you are looking for better online romance novels , it's time to visit Inglath Cooper.
